```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
dd <- read.csv2("bank.csv")
```

```{r}
colSums(dd=="unknown")
dd$pdays[dd$pdays==-1] <- NA
dd$job[dd$job == "unknown"] <- NA
dd$education[dd$education == "unknown"] <- NA
dd$contact[dd$contact == "unknown"] <- NA
dd$poutcome[dd$poutcome == "unknown"] <- NA
colSums(is.na(dd))
```
